author: Yun Li
title: Charles Schwab says he would never buy the money-losing companies going public these days
description: Investing legend Charles Schwab said he would stay away from money-losing IPOs.
content:
Investing legend Charles Schwab, founder and chairman of his namesake brokerage firm, said he would stay away from money-losing companies going public.
